MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the CH6 and CH8 postcode area of Bagillt and Holywell, affecting properties in the local areas. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of location of a secondary fault on the electrical network and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible in stages by 10:00PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 6:23PM on 24th November 2020.
